channel.title: Recovery questions
channel.description:
Hi,
I've been looking to sell my main for some time, but the problem is that it has both recovery questions and an email registered to it. I think Jagex has changed the recovery system and made it so that you can't remove your current recoveries for some reason. Here's what I've tried so far:
1) Account management -> Recover stolen/lost password -> Entered email, and I was sent a link to reset my password = recoveries remain 2) -||- -> Didn't enter email, filled recoveries correctly, I was later sent an email to set a new password for the account = recoveries remain 3) I attempted to set new recoveries and then cancelling them afterwards = original recoveries remain
What can I do?

item.title: Recovery questions
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

@Carly: your PM box is full.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovery questions
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

Give him the recoveries and let me recover it.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovery questions
item.dc:creator: @Carly Carly
item.description:
@Carly wrote:

If all fails then just change the recoveries to whatever the buyer wants them set to.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovery questions
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Hi,

I’ve been looking to sell my main for some time, but the problem is that it has both recovery questions and an email registered to it. I think Jagex has changed the recovery system and made it so that you can’t remove your current recoveries for some reason. Here’s what I’ve tried so far:

  1. Account management -> Recover stolen/lost password -> Entered email, and I was sent a link to reset my password = recoveries remain
  2. -||- -> Didn’t enter email, filled recoveries correctly, I was later sent an email to set a new password for the account = recoveries remain
  3. I attempted to set new recoveries and then cancelling them afterwards = original recoveries remain

What can I do?

Read full topic
